$\frac{1}{{n \choose 2}} > \frac{1}{10n^2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

$f'(i)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={121}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[76df27e221873823027ef538cabdfa4f]%mdk
$i_{fake}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={122}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2b374b5d075dcc61a7893b631c61100e]%mdk
$w_{fake}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={122}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[175c0a6ee1b7a7c8a382bebee3ce5790]%mdk
$y_i = PRG(w_{fake}) + i_{fake}z + (i_{fake} \mod 3)z' (\mod 2) = PRG(w_{i}) + f'(i)z + (f'(i) \mod 3)z'(\mod 2)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={123}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2b374b5d075dcc61a7893b631c61100e]%mdk
$w_{fake}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={123}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[fed4ee6f80f3af948f5b25111d417f30]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={126}
PRG(w_{fake}) = \underbrace{PRG(w_i)}_{\text{Alice}} + \underbrace{f'(i)z + (f'(i)z  \mod 3)z' (\mod 2)}_{\text{randomized by Bob}} - \underbrace{i_{fake}z - (i_{fake} \mod 3)z' (\mod 2)}_{\text{also randomized by Bob}}   
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={128}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bbf4777bb94d26773c4d003c5ddefa5c]%mdk
$PRG: \zo^n \to \zo^{10n}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={129}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2b374b5d075dcc61a7893b631c61100e]%mdk
$w_{fake}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={129}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[46459a537948e9b4e1bd60122e93b3eb]%mdk
$\frac{2^n}{2^{10n}} = \frac{1}{2^{9n}}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={130}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[cc2919a3f58d86a591d21036744cb831]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2^{9n}}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={132}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[dfcf28d0734569a6a693bc8194de62bf]%mdk
$G$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={132}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[75fef7380b29a389c2a78f2d89d3ffe3]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={134}
\Pr[Bob accepts] \leq \frac{{n \choose 2} - 1}{{n \choose 2}} + \frac{1}{{n \choose 2}}\frac{1}{2^{9n}} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={136}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[c13540a6276876e7f1dc79d09081127b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={138}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[Bob rejects] &\geq 1 - 1 + \frac{1}{{n \choose 2}} = \frac{1}{{n \choose 2}2^{9n}} \\
&= \frac{1}{{n \choose 2}}(1 - \frac{1}{2^{9n}}) \\
& \geq \frac{1}{10n^2}
\end{aligned}    
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={145}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[58010065c5914ea8e1d02ea076ceccb4]%mdk
$x,\hat{x}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={226}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3d9ae6d78cecffb391ef7928094b8d97]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2^k}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={229}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[07ad31d2b7c7230672acb4ea76fc8ad5]%mdk
$x \neq \hat{x}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={229}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[1dd2eaea317b1ee3c992899ca7a01cb1]%mdk
$(\pm x)^2 = (\pm \hat{x})$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={230}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[eca3bf81573307ec3002cf846390d363]%mdk
$\frac{1}{4}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={230}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2f9f317072d221079d124cfe5c6f2af9]%mdk
$gcd(x - \hat{x},m) = p$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={231}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[3b67669de481e6a872ecc05f901b17bd]%mdk
$\varphi(x) = (x,y)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={231}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5f7e4bec038b9c9e6621e4f53cb13478]%mdk
$\varphi(\hat{x}) = (\hat{x},\hat{y})$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={232}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e975db04f2787ff246f771a1215760c6]%mdk
$\varphi(x - \hat{x}) = (x,y) - (\hat{x},\hat{y}) = (0,2\hat{y})$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={233}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f89f2e1b1ba1ebfac5cfb35868a69a5d]%mdk
$x-\hat{x} = 0 \hat{x} \pmod{p}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={233}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[deb73e5352079482a6da547edf338ca8]%mdk
$x - \hat{x} \neq 0 \pmod{q}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={233}
